overview: Follow the adventures of Goldilocks as she ventures through the enchanted forest on her way to the house of the 3 Bears. See Goldilocks and the 3 bears for the first time ever in breathtaking LawrenceVision 3-D. Meet the zany Blue Bird of Happiness, the Fairy Goddess of the Forest and Cappo the Magician. Watch these fun filled characters in amazing 3-D as they appear to almost come out of the screen and touch you.
tagline: In real 3D that almost comes out of the screen and touches you!
title: Goldilocks & the 3 Bears in 3D
